headline: This Famous Investor Thinks Tesla's Stock Price Will Reach $2,600 Due to 1 Exciting Growth Catalyst
summary: It's been a tough year for Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA), with shares falling by 25% over the first four months of 2025.  According to a recent interview, Wood believes Tesla's stock price will rise by more than 1,000% over the next five years.  Historically, the biggest catalysts for Tesla's sales growth has been new product introductions.
